name: Orb Arcade
description:
This is my first game that I've actually completed, and it was a learning experience for sure. It's simple, just dodge the bullets and collect green orbs. Press D to automatically kill yourself.

See if you can beat my high score: 1417

Here's a link to Scott Holmes's page on the Free Music Archive: 

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Scott_Holmes
